stimulusHtml: Find the average rate of change of W over the interval 5 ≤ v ≤ 60 . Find the value of v at which the instantaneous rate of change of W is equal to the average rate of change of W over the interval 5 ≤ v ≤ 60 ..

features.html: The wind chill is the temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit (oF), a human feels based on the air temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit, and the wind velocity v, in miles per hour (mph). If the air temperature is 32 oF, then the wind chill is given by W(v)=55.6-22.1v0.16 and is valid for 5 ≤ v ≤60.
